argumentText:
ARGUMENT
d

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tmsval.m | |- M = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } |
| 2 |  | tmsval.k | |- K = ( toMetSp ` D ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-tms | |- toMetSp = ( d e. U. ran *Met |-> ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. } sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` d ) >. ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> toMetSp = ( d e. U. ran *Met |-> ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. } sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` d ) >. ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( d = D -> dom d = dom D ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( d = D -> dom dom d = dom dom D ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xmetf | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( D : ( X X. X ) --> RR* -> dom D = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> dom D = ( X X. X ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> dom dom D = dom ( X X. X ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dmxpid | |- dom ( X X. X ) = X |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> dom dom D = X ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_sylan9eqr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> dom dom d = X ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. = <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. ) |
| 15 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> d = D ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. = <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_preq12d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. } = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , X >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , D >. } ) |
| 18 | 17, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. } = M ) |
| 19 | 15 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ( MetOpen ` d ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_opeq2d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` d ) >. = <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) |
| 21 | 18, 20 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) /\ d = D ) -> ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , dom dom d >. , <. ( dist ` ndx ) , d >. } sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` d ) >. ) = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fvssunirn | |- ( *Met ` X ) C_ U. ran *Met |
| 23 | 22 | #P_sseli | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> D e. U. ran *Met ) |
| 24 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) e. _V |
| 25 | 24 | #P_a1i | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) e. _V ) |
| 26 | 4, 21, 23, 25 | #P_fvmptd | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> ( toMetSp ` D ) = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 27 | 2, 26 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( D e. ( *Met ` X ) -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
